metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4545 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The http_negotiate_create_context function in protocol/http/http_negotiate.c in ELinks 0.12 before 0.12pre6, when using HTTP Negotiate or GSS-Negotiate authentication, delegates user credentials through GSSAPI, which allows remote servers to authenticate as the client via the delegated credentials.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4545` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

elinks - 0.12~pre5-9ubuntu1
elinks-data - 0.12~pre5-9ubuntu1
elinks-lite - 0.12~pre5-9ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elinks package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.12~pre5-9ubuntu1').
